about_the_game:
In the demo version, you will have access to one case where you can feel like a real detective. You will have the opportunity to conduct a full investigation, gather evidence, question witnesses, and uncover the true culprit behind the heinous crime.

We will introduce you to the main game mechanics, as well as the setting of the game, which takes place in the 1980s, a time when the atmosphere of mysteries and crimes was at its peak. By completing this case, you will be able to assess the complexity of the decisions and immerse yourself in the intense world of private investigations.

Set in the 1980s, you take on the role of a private detective, tasked with solving cases where justice has faltered.

Each case will challenge you to navigate intricate crime scenes, question witnesses, and gather evidence with your keen deductive skills. You can revisit crime scenes at different times of day, catching suspects off guard and unraveling the hidden truths within their stories.

Murder Avenue is a demanding detective game for fans of true crime and mystery, emphasizing sharp observation, critical thinking, and the exhilarating pursuit of justice in a world where it doesn’t always prevail.

You're a real detective.
Step into the shoes of an investigator. Study the cases. Examine crime scenes, using your keen instincts to uncover hidden clues. Question witnesses and interrogate suspects. Your choices will determine whether the culprit ends up behind bars or slips away.

The detective's office is your second home.
There's always a hefty stack of case files waiting on your desk, each one demanding your full attention. And don't forget to crack the window open—too much cigarette smoke can cloud your judgment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x86 and x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent | AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 6000+ (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x86 and x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q9300 (4 * 2500) or equivalent | AMD A10-5800K APU (4*3800) or equivalent
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Murder Avenue is a detective game crafted for true crime aficionados. Immerse yourself in detailed crime scenes, hunt for clues, interrogate suspects, analyze motives, and unearth the truth behind each case.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Czech, Japanese
